name: Ultragun Dreamland
description:
Welcome to the Dreamland!

UGDL pits you up against at most 16 of your friends (or others) in a hectic Free-for-All FPS arena inspired by popular classic shooters!

Equipped with three weapons, the Blaster, Rocket Launcher, and Rail Rifle - shoot your way to collecting the three Ultra Souls within the map. Holding these will increase your health but be warned, others will want to take it from you! Open the way to the Ultragun and sacrifice the three souls to obtain it; use it to permanently eliminate others until you are the last one standing.

Other game modes include Team Deathmatch, Domination (fight for the Ultragun), and Capture (collect points by holding the Ultra Souls)

IMPORTANT INFO

  • Must connect to servers via IP address
  • Ultragun Dreamland is multiplayer only, there is no single player mode nor is it planned.
  • You can host/play or set up server only
  • To set up a server you'll need some networking know how for port-forwarding and the such

*If you host a server and have Xfinity you will need to disable advanced security even with the ports forwarded.
